description: Cardinal Becciu managed a controversial deal to buy a luxury London property with church funds.
title: Cardinal Becciu: Vatican official forced out in rare resignation
title_page: Cardinal Becciu: Vatican official forced out in rare resignation - BBC News
maintext: But the cardinal, 72, told Italian website Domani he was being forced out because he was suspected of giving Church money to his brothers. "I didn't steal even one euro. I am not under investigation but if they send me to trial, I will defend myself," he was quoted as saying.
